snippet: The South Dakota House on Thursday failed to override Gov. Dennis Daugaard’s veto of a bill requiring transgender students to use bathrooms and locker rooms corresponding with their birth gender.
abstract: South Dakota House fails to muster support for override of veto, by Gov Dennis Daugaard, of bill that sought to require transgender students to use bathrooms and locker rooms matching their gender at birth.
lead_paragraph: The South Dakota House on Thursday failed to override Gov. Dennis Daugaard’s veto of a bill requiring transgender students to use bathrooms and locker rooms corresponding with their birth gender.

headline.main: South Dakota: Veto Stands on Bill to Set Transgender Student Bathroom Rules
headline.print_headline: South Dakota: Veto Stands on Bill to Set Transgender Student Bathroom Rules
